dimension.name: Clarity
dimension.definition: The author uses clear, grammatically correct and unambiguous language. The author sticks to the main topic and does not make things overly complicated.

dimension.name: Global Relevance
dimension.definition: The counter-argument (assuming it is true), is relevant for resolving a discussion around the issue.

dimension.name: Local Relevance
dimension.definition: The counter-argument (assuming it is true), is relevant to the argument: it tells why one could refute the argument.
